title: Linux cmp Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the cmp command in Linux, learn how to compare text and binary files, and gain practical experience with hands-on examples.

meta.title: Linux cmp Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the cmp command in Linux, learn how to compare text and binary files, and gain practical experience with hands-on examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, cmp command, file comparison, text files, binary files, command-line tools

verify.name: Verify the cmp command usage
verify.hint: Ensure that you have created the `file1.txt` and `file2.txt` files with different content, and that the `cmp` command correctly identifies the difference between them.

verify.name: Verify the cmp command for text file comparison
verify.hint: Ensure that you have created the `file1.txt` and `file2.txt` files with different content, and that the `cmp` command correctly identifies the difference between them.

verify.name: Verify the cmp command for binary file comparison
verify.hint: Ensure that you have created the `file1.bin` and `file2.bin` files with different random data, and that the `cmp` command correctly identifies the difference between them.
